author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Astrazeneca Says ‍Selumetinib In Nf1 Gets FDA Orphan Drug Status​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Astrazeneca Plc:
* ‍SELUMETINIB IN NF1 GETS FDA ORPHAN DRUG STATUS​ * US FDA GRANTED ORPHAN DRUG DESIGNATION (ODD) FOR SELUMETINIB, A MEK 1/2 INHIBITOR, FOR TREATMENT OF NEUROFIBROMATOSIS TYPE 1 (NF1)​
* ‍SELUMETINIB IN NF1 GETS FDA ORPHAN DRUG STATUS​ * ‍PHASE II TRIAL RESULTS ARE EXPECTED LATER IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
